The 5-day program was well-paced and challenging. The instructor created a great, warm environment for participants.
Air conditioning was set too high all five days, making it very uncomfortable.
The 10-day course materials felt very comprehensive, but a few chapters were clearly out of date.
The trainer was exceptional. He made the long 10-day course enjoyable and kept us engaged throughout the entire time.
Only sugary snacks were provided; for a 5-day training, a healthier variety of drinks and snacks is essential.
The classroom for the 10-day course was a bit cramped. We needed more space for the group exercises and practical work.
The Wi-Fi for the group activities was extremely unreliable
Very good and professional trainer. I enjoyed and found this 5-day course most helpful. Thank you.
The course was extremely useful and well taught. It met all of my expectations for a 5-day intensive.
Please provide a printed manual next time. Having to rely solely on the digital materials for the whole 10 days was tough on the eyes.

I felt a bit rushed in the last two days of the 10-day course; we needed more time to absorb the advanced material.
An awesome work. Content was relevant and well presented. Catering was great as usual for the week-long course.

The presenter was clearly reading from the slides too much. I felt disengaged.

All the provided desktop computers were infected with a virus.
